Gainsborough Community Library

Manager: Mandy Grimwood

Clapgate Lane, Ipswich
IP3 0RL

Tel: 01473 260888
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Voices for Gainsborough Community Library

Social media:

  • Facebook

Facilities

  • Free wifi available
  • Scanning, printing and photocopying facilities
  • Accessibility information
  • Borrow an eReader from the library

Room hire

Display space

Two cork boards in cafe area for posters

  • A5: 25p per sheet
  • A4: 50p per sheet
  • A3: £1 per sheet
